vulnerability_findings.name: Timestamp Dependency
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(acc.balance >= MinSum && acc.balance >= _am && now > acc.unlockTime, "Insufficient balance or not yet unlocked");

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: msg in Log.addMessage (patch_15.sol#50) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-builtin
vulnerability_findings.message: Log.addMessage.msg (local variable @ patch_15.sol#50) shadows built-in symbol "msg"
